name: Emergency Care
description: ER is equipped with all lifesaving support for critically ill patients including ventilators, defibrillators and monitors. Emergency Room (ER) provides non-stop life-saving care 24 hours a day.

name: Cardiology Care
description: we have been caring for the hearts of El Paso for over 30 years. Our cardiologists are all board-certified

name: 24/7 Pharmacy Service
description: We have 24/7 pharmacy service for you. around 100 senior pharmacy professionals and primarily focused on hospital care, Specialist Pharmacy Services (SPS)

name: Diagnostic
type: world class pathology lab with expert
description: we have cost-effective, and high quality diagnostic care in safe and secure environments. It includes the clinical services of Pathology and Laboratory Medicine, Radiology, and Nuclear Medicine

name: Dental Care

name: Neuro Care
description: Country's First centre of excellence, providing high quality personalized care through an eminent faculty of Neuro-medicine, Neuro-surgery, Neuro-anesthesia, Psychiatry, Radiology and Imaging along with Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation.
